name: Honey Garlic Chicken with Rosemary
author: Linette Gall Kalbach
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Melt butter in a large saucepan over medium heat
Add garlic powder, rosemary, salt, and pepper; simmer until flavors combine, about 1 minute
Stir in honey; bring to a boil
Dip chicken into sauce, 1 piece at a time, until coated
Place chicken on a 9x13-inch baking pan; pour remaining sauce over chicken
Bake chicken in the preheated oven until no longer pink at the bone and the juices run clear, about 30 minutes
An instant-read thermometer inserted near the bone should read 165 degrees F (74 degrees C)
Remove from oven; immediately turn over chicken with tongs to coat the top with sauce
